title: Speed of a parametric function at a specific time

content.prompt: The position of an object moving along a path in the xy-plane is given by the parametric equations  x( t )=5sin( πt ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42AD@  and  y( t )= ( 2t−1 ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40C6@ . The speed of the particle at time t = 0 is

unit.text: 9: Parametric Equations, Polar Coordinates, and Vector-Valued Functions

topic.text: 9.6: (BC ONLY) Solving Motion Problems Using Parametric and Vector-Valued Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
